import React , {useState} from 'react'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; import PageTitle from '../components/pagetitle'; BuyCryptoConfirm.propTypes = { }; function BuyCryptoConfirm(props) { const [dataCryptoTab] = useState([ { id: 1, title: 'Overview', }, { id: 2, title: 'Buy Crypto', }, { id: 3, title: 'Sell Crypto', }, ]); return (
{ dataCryptoTab.map(idx => ( {idx.title} )) }
